channel.title: Dwarf Fortress Talk
channel.itunes:author: Rainseeker, Capntastic, Toady One, Threetoe
channel.itunes:summary: Each episode of Dwarf Fortress talk typically covers a topic or two of interest to Dwarf Fortress fans, whether it's future development, discussions of game mechanics, news from Bay 12 Games, progress reports, Q&A, or the occasional equipment adjustment by Scamps.
channel.description: Bay 12 news, progress reports, Q&A etc.

item.title: Dwarf Fortress Talk #28
item.itunes:author: Rainseeker, Capntastic, Toady One, Scamps
item.itunes:summary: In this episode, Rainseeker, Capntastic and Toady One answer lots of questions and digress from time to time.

item.title: Dwarf Fortress Talk #27
item.itunes:author: Rainseeker, Capntastic, Toady One, Scamps
item.itunes:summary: In this episode, Rainseeker, Capntastic and Toady One discuss the in-game dwarf art, answer many questions, and check out some fan art by Arne. If you can while you are listening, visit Arne's page at http://www.androidarts.com/df/dorf.htm and admire along with us.

item.title: Dwarf Fortress Talk #26
item.itunes:author: Brian Bucklew, Rainseeker, Capntastic, Toady One
item.itunes:summary: In this episode, special guest Brian Bucklew of Freehold Games joins Rainseeker, Capntastic and Toady One to talk about Caves of Qud development and other matters.
item.itunes:keywords: bay 12, dwarf fortress, freehold games, caves of qud

item.title: Dwarf Fortress Talk #25
item.itunes:author: Rainseeker, Capntastic, Toady One
item.itunes:summary: In this episode, Rainseeker, Capntastic and Toady One discuss a few reddit posts, the possibility of human forts and other topics, and answer questions.

item.title: Dwarf Fortress Talk #24
item.itunes:author: Rainseeker, Capntastic, Toady One
item.itunes:summary: In this episode, Rainseeker returns to join Capntastic and Toady One to tease UI development and play with the myth generator prototype.

item.title: Dwarf Fortress Talk #23
item.itunes:author: Capntastic, Toady One
item.itunes:summary: In this episode, Capntastic and Toady One return after several years to discuss the upcoming graphical version and other developments.

item.title: Dwarf Fortress Talk #22
item.itunes:author: Toady One, Threetoe
item.itunes:summary: In this emergency episode, Threetoe and Toady One discuss the new development plans and answer the entire gigantic backlog of questions.

item.title: Dwarf Fortress Talk #21
item.itunes:author: Rainseeker, Capntastic, Toady One, Threetoe
item.itunes:summary: In this episode, Rainseeker, Capntastic and Toady One discuss the recent developments in combat and conversations, among other things. Threetoe and Toady answer between two and three dozen questions as they continue to work on the pile.

item.title: Dwarf Fortress Talk #20
item.itunes:author: Rainseeker, Capntastic, Toady One, Threetoe
item.itunes:summary: In this episode, Rainseeker, Capntastic and Toady One discuss the continuing development of Dwarf Fortress (at least up until succession which I was working on during the time of the recording). Threetoe and Toady answer a small fraction of your questions, which appeared in great numbers.

item.title: Dwarf Fortress Talk #19
item.itunes:author: Rainseeker, Capntastic, Toady One, Threetoe
item.itunes:summary: In this episode, Rainseeker, Capntastic and Toady One return to discuss the development of Dwarf Fortress. Threetoe appears again on the question and answer segment.

item.title: Dwarf Fortress Talk #18
item.itunes:author: Rainseeker, Capntastic, Toady One, Threetoe
item.itunes:summary: In this episode, Rainseeker, Capntastic and Toady One discuss the latest release of Dwarf Fortress and what's coming next. Threetoe makes his first appearance to answer questions with Toady.

item.title: Dwarf Fortress Talk #17
item.itunes:author: Rainseeker, Capntastic, Toady One
item.itunes:summary: In this episode, Rainseeker, Capntastic and Toady One discuss Dwarf Fortress play styles and answer your questions.

item.title: Dwarf Fortress Talk #16
item.itunes:author: Rainseeker, Capntastic, Toady One
item.itunes:summary: In this episode, recorded in August, Rainseeker, Capntastic and Toady One discuss legacies of forts and adventurers as well as a bit about planes of existence.

item.title: Dwarf Fortress Talk #15 Mini
item.itunes:author: Rainseeker, Capntastic, Toady One
item.itunes:summary: In this short episode, Rainseeker, Capntastic and Toady One perform the main task of reminding listeners of the Redding meetup (Saturday, July 16!) and then ramble a bit about recent developments.

item.title: Dwarf Fortress Talk #14
item.itunes:author: Rainseeker, Capntastic, Toady One
item.itunes:summary: In this episode, Rainseeker, Capntastic and Toady One discuss the new night creatures and answer questions. The first half was recorded back in the middle of May, but it's all still relevant.

item.title: Dwarf Fortress Talk #13
item.itunes:author: Rainseeker, Capntastic, Toady One
item.itunes:summary: In this episode, Rainseeker, Capntastic and Toady One discuss cities and answer questions.

item.title: Dwarf Fortress Talk #12
item.itunes:author: Rainseeker, Capntastic, Toady One
item.itunes:summary: In this episode, Rainseeker, Capntastic and Toady One discuss inns, talk about the past and future of DF, and answer questions.

item.title: Dwarf Fortress Talk #11
item.itunes:author: Rainseeker, Capntastic, Toady One
item.itunes:summary: In this episode, Rainseeker, Capntastic and Toady One talk a little about personalities, answer questions, and ramble on at length about the upcoming releases.

item.title: Dwarf Fortress Talk #10
item.itunes:author: Rainseeker, Capntastic, Toady One
item.itunes:summary: In this episode, Rainseeker, Capntastic and Toady One talk about the upcoming release, answer questions and carry on. We had difficulty scheduling a time for this recording, so we recorded two segments with Toady and each co-host on different weeks and we didn't attempt to cover a listener suggested topic. Toady also forgot the credits at the end of the second segment, so here they are amplified in the description: Ollieh did the music. mallocks generally does the transcript, which'll be posted in time.

item.title: Dwarf Fortress Talk #9
item.itunes:author: Rainseeker, Capntastic, Toady One
item.itunes:summary: In this episode, Rainseeker, Capntastic and Toady One talk about some of the sciences with respect to Dwarf Fortress and answer some email questions. There is also a heat-addled extra hour available on the web page.

item.title: Dwarf Fortress Talk #8
item.itunes:author: Rainseeker, Capntastic, Toady One
item.itunes:summary: In this episode, Rainseeker, Capntastic and Toady One talk about some of the sciences with respect to Dwarf Fortress and answer some email questions.

item.title: Dwarf Fortress Talk #7 Part 2
item.itunes:author: Rainseeker, Capntastic, Toady One
item.itunes:summary: In this missing segment, Rainseeker, Capntastic and Toady One talk about the future of artifacts.

item.title: Dwarf Fortress Talk #7
item.itunes:author: Rainseeker, Capntastic, Toady One
item.itunes:summary: In this episode, Rainseeker, Capntastic and Toady One talk about artifacts.

item.title: Dwarf Fortress Talk #6
item.itunes:author: Rainseeker, Capntastic, Toady One
item.itunes:summary: In this episode, Rainseeker, Capntastic and Toady One talk about the future of adventure mode and answer some email questions.

item.title: Dwarf Fortress Talk #5
item.itunes:author: Rainseeker, Capntastic, Toady One
item.itunes:summary: In this episode, Rainseeker, Capntastic and Toady One talk about the future of the game's cultures and do some forum questions.

item.title: Dwarf Fortress Talk #4
item.itunes:author: Rainseeker, Capntastic, Toady One
item.itunes:summary: In this episode, Rainseeker and Toady One talk about world generation, legends, crafting and do some forum questions while pondering Capntastic's crimefighting-related absence.

item.title: Dwarf Fortress Talk #3
item.itunes:author: Rainseeker, Capntastic, Toady One
item.itunes:summary: In this episode, Rainseeker, Capntastic and Toady One talk about the underground caverns, followed by questions from the forum.

item.title: Dwarf Fortress Talk #2
item.itunes:author: Rainseeker, Capntastic, Toady One
item.itunes:summary: In this episode, Rainseeker, Capntastic, Ampersand and Toady One discuss sieges with a sprinkling of megabeasts and other topics, followed by a forum Q&A session.

item.title: Dwarf Fortress Talk #1
item.itunes:author: Rainseeker, Capntastic, Toady One
item.itunes:summary: During our first time out, Toady One answers a wide variety of questions that Rainseeker and Capntastic collected from the forum.
